name: Death Cruise
description:
The World Has Ended  so let's destroy everything

CREDITS
Game by Waldo 
Original Music by Isaac Joel, remixed by Waldo

To learn how to make games like this check out my YouTube channel

Made in 72 hours for #SCOREJAM

CONTROLS
Move with Arrow Keys / AWSD / Joystick (Controller Enabled)

POINT SYSTEM
Each item destroyed is 100 points
Combo points are worth 300 points
Each wave survived is 1,000 points

DESTRUCTABLES
 

AFTER WAVE #3

AFTER WAVE #5
